text.div:
This code system https://www.napkon.de/fhir/CodeSystem/napkon-vaccination-module defines the following codes:

CodeDisplay
q1001 Willingness for additional SARS-CoV-2 vaccination if recommended
2001 To protect myself from infection with SARS-CoV-2 or from COVID-19
2002 To protect my private environment from infection with SARS-CoV-2 or COVID-19
2003 To protect my work environment from infection with SARS-CoV-2 or COVID-19
2004 Because everyone gets vaccinated
2005 Because I am afraid of being discriminated against due to my vaccination status (e.g. travel ban, work ban).
no-longer No longer
pain-by-pressure Pain provoked by pressure

name: NapkonVaccinationModule
title: NAPKON Vaccination Module Codes
description: NAPKON Vaccination Module Code System - Collection of vaccination module-specific codes that are missing from common terminologies such as SNOMED CT

concept.display: Willingness for additional SARS-CoV-2 vaccination if recommended
To protect myself from infection with SARS-CoV-2 or from COVID-19
To protect my private environment from infection with SARS-CoV-2 or COVID-19
To protect my work environment from infection with SARS-CoV-2 or COVID-19
Because I am afraid of being discriminated against due to my vaccination status (e.g. travel ban, work ban).
